description: Want to surprise your guests with something unique? Smoking Blueberry Lavender is the perfect drink for that. The vibrant red color and the mysterious smoke on top can certainly attract eyeballs at any event.
name: Smoking Blueberry Lavender

recipeInstructions.name: Add all the ingredients to a pan and heat until the blueberries burst. This will yield 11 ounces of syrup.
recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients to a pan and heat until the blueberries burst. This will yield 11 ounces of syrup.

recipeInstructions.name: Remove the pan from the heat when the mixture has a thick consistency.
recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pan from the heat when the mixture has a thick consistency.

recipeInstructions.name: Let the syrup cool before using it.
recipeInstructions.text: Let the syrup cool before using it.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the shaker with ice halfway before pouring 2 ounces of syrup and 2 ounces of vodka. Shake until cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the shaker with ice halfway before pouring 2 ounces of syrup and 2 ounces of vodka. Shake until cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the mixture in a martini glass and add lavender bitters, followed by fresh lavender.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain the mixture in a martini glass and add lavender bitters, followed by fresh lavender.

recipeInstructions.name: Wear gloves and use tongs to add a small 1-inch cube of dry ice into the glass. You can use a tea ball strainer to encase the dry ice before submerging it into the drink.

recipeInstructions.name: Wait until the dry ice evaporates before drinking it.
